lead_paragraph: Permira, the British buyout shop, has teamed with the retail executive John Lovering to launch a bid for the British furniture retailer DFS, The Sunday Times reported.
snippet: Permira, the British buyout shop, has teamed up with the retail executive John Lovering to launch a bid for the British furniture retailer DFS, The Sunday Times reported.

headline.main: Permira Said to Mull Move on Britain's DFS

abstract: Permira, the British buyout shop, has teamed up with the retail executive John Lovering to launch a bid for the British furniture retailer DFS, The Sunday Times reported.
